data.eml:eml: Description of two new species of the genus Stenothemus from Taiwan (Coleoptera: Cantharidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hsiao, Yun (2015): Description of two new species of the genus Stenothemus from Taiwan (Coleoptera: Cantharidae). Zootaxa 3937 (2): 386-392, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3937.2.9
